note.p: Birth: 22 Princes Street, Spitalfields, London, England (22 August 1838)

Career: Unpaid Assistant, Rothamsted Laboratory; Royal Agricultural College, Cirencester (1862-1867); staff, Lawes manure and citric acid works, at Barking and Millwall (1867-1876); Staff, Rothamsted (1876-1890); studied nitrification of soil; Sibthorpian Professor of Agrticulture, Oxford University (1894-1897)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1908 vol 80 pp xv-xxiv signed by P S U P
